name: Urban Zakapa
description: '''Urban Zakapa''' ({{korean|어반자카파||Eobanjakapa}}) is a South Korean [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] singer-songwriter group formed in 2009 by [[Fluxus Music]]. Originally a 9-member group, in 2012 they became a trio, consisting of Park Yong-in, Jo Hyunah and Kwon Soon-il. The group's name is an abbreviation for '''Urban''', '''Za'''ppy, '''Ka'''leidoscopic, and '''Pa'''ssionate.
